proceeds from repayments of other debt
Proceeds from Stock Issuance: proceeds from issuance of common stock
proceeds from issuance of shares under incentive and share based compensation plans including stock options
Stock Repurchases: payments for repurchase of common stock

note payable assumed in connection with acquisition of real estate

Changes in Operating Assets and Liabilit: increase decrease in other accrued liabilities
increase decrease in other operating assets

net cash provided by used in operating activities
